Text: NOT NTSC despite what douchdo baggins says, 3 days to download a single DVD from this folder and ends up being PAL, what a turd

To the troll above: It's not my rip, asshole. I grabbed the entire torrent from another site which stated it was NTSC, and just now found this out myself when I tried to create DVD 4. I was going to say the same thing.

So, DVDs 1 thru 3 are NTSC and are the real jewels of the DVD portion of the set. DVD 4 you can easily find elsewhere in NTSC if you want it.

CDs 1 thru 6 are awesome too.
To phisher1631: You call ME a turd, douche, and other such immature names? When all you do is take and take and contribute nothing (or seed) in return?? Take a look in the mirror.
